title: Twenty councils in England ask for election delays
description: Nearly a third of eligible authorities have want to postpone local polls scheduled for May.
content:
About a third of eligible councils in England have asked to postpone their elections due in May, according to BBC research.

title: US Senate kills resolution that would have limited Trump action in Venezuela
description: Republicans Josh Hawley and Todd Young flipped after receiving ‘assurances’ from Trump administration
content:
The US Senate has voted against a war powers resolution that would have prevented Donald Trump from taking further military action against Venezuela without giving Congress advance notice.

title: Hearts 'underdogs by long shot' but still setting Premiership pace
description: If it seemed Hearts made a statement by winning with 10 men at Dundee on Sunday, they upped the ante against St Mirren four days later.
content:

title: Zelensky declares state of emergency in Ukraine's energy sector
description: The move comes as US President Donald Trump said Ukraine is "less ready" than the Russian president to make a peace deal.
content:
Ukraine has declared a state of emergency in the country's energy sector, with a particular focus on Kyiv, as ongoing Russian strikes continue to leave thousands of residents without power.

title: Portrush: Man worked on farm for five hours with heart attack
description: Robert Nevin woke in the middle of the night in February 2024 with what he believed was indigestion, but it was a heart attack.
content:
A 60-year-old man who spent a day working on his farm before driving himself to hospital with a heart attack is urging people not to ignore symptoms.
